common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/eticket/ma/consume')
request.add_api_parameter("biz_type", "3001")
request.add_api_parameter("serial_num", "fadfa123123")
request.add_api_parameter("pos_id", "2132312")
request.add_api_parameter("outer_id", "1753340805138544")
request.add_api_parameter("consume_num", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("code", "abc")
request.add_api_parameter("consume_store_id", "123123")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/eticket/ma/consume')
request.add_api_param('biz_type', '3001')
request.add_api_param('serial_num', 'fadfa123123')
request.add_api_param('pos_id', '2132312')
request.add_api_param('outer_id', '1753340805138544')
request.add_api_param('consume_num', '1')
request.add_api_param('code', 'abc')
request.add_api_param('consume_store_id', '123123')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
